Comments_List: General knowledge about the science behind cry-electron microscopy. Learned about the math and hardware behind the microscope and how computational programs and updates have been developed to optimize the technique.
Mathematical theory behind single-particle reconstruction; technical skills to consider with Cryo-em; sample preparation; troubleshooting ideas
Very good course, would like more practical demonstrations.

Strengths: material being presented; professors engagement with students and genuine interest

Weaknesses: method of teaching could be improved; assigning more videos to compliment lectures could be helpful and supporting material. Some students are more advanced than others but some material maybe be fairly new to others.
yeah, the course is helpful for cryo-EM researcher
Yes, but should have previous knowledge of Fourier transform.
I would recommend this course to students highly interested in learning Cryo-em.
